summary:
...BERYL FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN TO A HURRICANE AGAIN BEFORE LANDFALL... ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WARNINGS IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF THE TEXAS COAST...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Sat Jul 6
 the center of Beryl was located near 24.7, -94.0
 with movement NW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 993 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
